basic.Peptide Name: Human beta-defensin 3 (BD-3, hBD-3; Hbd3; Beta-defensin 103; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.11085990]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DSM1103 (MIC=9.4 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM681 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM1128 (MIC=18.75 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=4.7 µg/ml), Streptococcus pneumoniae DSM11865 (MIC=4.7 µg/ml).
